architecture_patterns.pattern: Two-phase Playwright scraping with concurrent execution

phase_1_url_extraction.flow: Open search URL → Scrape job URLs → Deduplicate against jobs table (platform='naukri' + url) → Store to job_url table
phase_1_url_extraction.database: INSERT into job_url after EXISTS check on jobs table

phase_2_detail_scraping.flow: Load URLs from job_url → Open in batches → Extract job details → Parse skills from description → Store to jobs table
phase_2_detail_scraping.database: INSERT into jobs with full details + skills

architecture_patterns.anti_detection: headless=False shows visible browser to bypass Naukri bot detection

architecture_patterns.unified_folder: Old Playwright scrapers for Indeed - ignore

emd_compliance.benefit: Single source of truth for skill extraction

cost_savings.proxy: Optional for LinkedIn only, not needed for Indeed/Naukri
